info.modalContent:
Accounts represent your customers or business units in Flipika, allowing you to organize and manage your Google Ads & Meta Ads reporting by account.

With accounts, you can:
• Associate each account with a specific Google Ads account
• Upload custom logos for branded reports
• Set default templates and themes for automatic application
• Store contact information to automatically address reports to the account's email
• Organize your reports by account for easy access

Accounts help you streamline your workflow and ensure consistent, professional reporting for each customer.
